boiled_eggs_tips:
1. Don’t forget to salt the cooking water.
2. Add a bit of vinegar for eggs that are even easier to peel.
3. Use eggs at room temperature for more even cooking.
soft_boiled_eggs_tips:
1. Be careful not to overcook the eggs for a creamy yolk.
2. Don’t forget to plunge your eggs into cold water after cooking.
hard_boiled_eggs_tips:
1. Cook the eggs for 10 minutes to get perfect hard-boiled eggs.
2. Cool them in ice-cold water to stop the cooking process.
poached_eggs_tips:
1. Add vinegar to the water to help the egg white hold better.
2. Crack the egg into a ramekin before gently placing it in the hot water.
fried_eggs_tips:
1. To keep the yolk intact, heat the pan gently.
2. Use a small amount of oil for the best result.
baked_eggs_tips:
1. Preheat the oven before baking your eggs.
2. You can add some heavy cream for even creamier eggs.
boiled_eggs_result: White barely set, yolk very runny
